text: Allen Nilan (1 April 1913 – 10 October 1994) was an Australian rules footballer who played for the Fitzroy Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * * Category:1913 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Fitzroy Football Club players Category:University Blues Football Club players
title: Allen Nilan
